job_details.Vacaturetitel: Big Data Engineer for AI Training
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Outlier helps the world's most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback. Are you an experienced software engineer who would like to lend your coding expertise to train AI models?
       We partner with organizations to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. There is no requirement for previous AI experience.
       About the opportunity:
          + Outlier is looking for talented coders to help train generative artificial intelligence models
          + This freelance opportunity is remote and hours are flexible, so you can work whenever is best for you
       You may contribute your expertise by
          + Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
          + Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models
job_details.full_text:
Big Data Engineer for AI Training

Outlier helps the world's most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback. Are you an experienced software engineer who would like to lend your coding expertise to train AI models?
       We partner with organizations to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. There is no requirement for previous AI experience.
       About the opportunity:
          + Outlier is looking for talented coders to help train generative artificial intelligence models
          + This freelance opportunity is remote and hours are flexible, so you can work whenever is best for you
       You may contribute your expertise by
          + Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
          + Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on using AI models to generate and evaluate code, rather than building, training, or deploying AI models. It emphasizes human feedback and question crafting for AI training, which aligns more with data annotation or AI-assisted tasks rather than core AI engineering roles.

evidence.justification: This phrase directly indicates involvement in the training process of AI models, which falls under the 'Modeling' category.
This specifies the type of models being trained (generative AI), reinforcing the 'Modeling' task.

evidence.phrase: Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
evidence.justification: This describes a method of contributing to AI model training by providing specific data inputs (questions and answers), which is a form of model training.

evidence.phrase: Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models
evidence.justification: This involves assessing the output of AI models, which is a crucial part of the model development and refinement cycle, fitting within the broader scope of 'Modeling'.

evidence.phrase: improve their AI models by providing human feedback
evidence.justification: This highlights the business objective of improving AI models, indicating an understanding of the value proposition.

evidence.phrase: helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code
evidence.justification: This describes the business impact and goal of the AI models being worked on.

evidence.phrase: no requirement for previous AI experience
lend your coding expertise to train AI models
Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems
Crafting and answering questions related to computer science
